channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration pulling 700 immigration agents from Minnesota
item.description: The Trump administration will withdraw 700 federal immigration agents from Minnesota "effective immediately," border czar Tom Homan announced Wednesda...

item.title: Exclusive: Majority of Trump voters back solar power, poll finds
item.description: A majority of Trump-coalition voters back solar power, especially if the panels are made in the U.S. and without Chinese materials, polling shared exc...

item.title: OpenAI's Meta makeover
item.description: Facebook's meteoric rise two decades ago offers OpenAI a rich but potentially treacherous playbook for the ChatGPT maker to defend and expand its lead...

item.title: The risk for the growing pool of everyday investors

item.title: Death of New START heralds "a world with more nuclear risk"
item.description: Tomorrow, the world lurches toward an age of international uncertainty and increased nuclear-weapons spending. New START is expiring. Why it matters: ...

item.title: Border czar Tom Homan says 700 ICE and CBP officers are leaving Minneapolis
item.description: The reduction is a significant scale back of the Department of Homeland Security’s presence in Minnesota and comes after two U.S. citizens were fatall...

item.title: Trump plans to install Christopher Columbus statue outside White House
item.description: The president has worked to recognize the explorer, saying Italian-Americans should “remember” Trump’s efforts when they go vote.

item.description: The governor and potential presidential candidate spoke about his mother’s controversial decision to end her life and the impact it had on his politic...

item.title: Fulton County demands return of ballots seized by federal officials
item.description: Fulton County officials go to court to demand return of ballots and other election materials seized by federal agents last week.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
